application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
T4 = To Fell 1 X Lawson Cypress to Ground Level.

T5 = To Fell 1 X Cypress Macrocarpa to Ground Level

Above Works to Enable Landscaping Works.

T9 = To Reduce 1 X Acer Negundo by 2.0/2.5Mtrs

General Maintenance
Light Access
decision_conditions: T4 = To Fell 1 X Lawson Cypress to Ground Level.
T5 = To Fell 1 X Cypress Macrocarpa to Ground Level

The, Lawson Cypress and the Cypress Macrocarpa, whilst there are two of these species listed on the schedule of Haverings TPO 41/90 these two trees are shown on the Havering plan as been adjacent to the brick wall to the rear of the property Bowers in Ayloffs Walk. There in requirement to gain permission to remove these two trees.

It is recommended that the Acer Negundo tree T9 as shown on the Havering TPO plan 41/90 can be overall crown reduced by up to 2.5m from the tip to an inter-nodal branch break to leave the tree balanced.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out as an overall reduction, so that the tree's crown remains balanced.
To ensure that the tree's stability is maintained and in the interests of public amenity.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
To prevent the accumulation of consents.
